title: Rebel with a Cause
features: Can opposites attract? Rugged tycoon Lorenzo Hall comes from the wrong side of the tracks, and this wild rebel has a new cause: he's aching to discover if his new assistant, Sophy Braithwaite, is as prim and proper as she looks!Of course, for Sophy, her smoldering boss should be off-limits. But it's easy to see how Lorenzo's criminally hot body and the dangerous twinkle in his eyes could tempt her to break all the rules….
description: USA Today bestselling author Natalie Anderson writes emotional contemporary romance full of sparkling banter, sizzling heat and uplifting endings--perfect for readers who love to escape with empowered heroines and arrogant alphas who are too sexy for their own good.When not writing you'll find her wrangling her 4 children, 3 cats, 2 goldish and 1 dog... and snuggled in a heap on the sofa with her husband at the end of the day.Follow her at www.natalie-anderson.com.

author: {'avatar': 'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/amzn-author-media-prod/nl0ji165dfu971nfnhv7phok7a._SY600_.jpg', 'name': 'Natalie Anderson', 'about': ['A USA TODAY bestselling author, Natalie Anderson writes emotional contemporary romance full of sparkling banter, sizzling heat and uplifting endings—perfect for readers who love to escape with empowered heroines and arrogant alphas who are too sexy for their own good.', 'With over 3 million books sold, her stories are translated into more than a dozen languages.', 'When not writing, you’ll find her wrangling her 4 children, 3 cats, 2 goldfish and 1 mini schnauzer… and snuggled up in a heap on the sofa with her husband at the end of the day.', 'She and the menagerie live in Christchurch, New Zealand.', 'Keep up with Natalie’s release schedule, find free reads and other fun stuff at her website http://www.natalie-anderson.com.']}
